system.descriptionText: May fire a weapon in each hand as if having the Two-Weapon Wielder Talent. If already possessing this talent, gives +10 to Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill when making an attack with one weapon in each hand.

description.value: May fire a weapon in each hand as if having the Two-Weapon Wielder Talent. If already possessing this talent, gives +10 to Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill when making an attack with one weapon in each hand.
